title: Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices: Electricity, Gas, and Other Fuels for Euro Area (18 countries)
notes:
The Harmonized Index of Consumer Prices category "Electricity, Gas, and Other Fuels (04.5)" is a classification of nondurable goods and energy. This category contains the Electricity (04.5.1), Gas (04.5.2), Liquid Fuels (04.5.3), Solid Fuels (04.5.4), and Heat Energy (04.5.5).

This category is a subcategory of Housing, Water, Electricity, Gas, and Other Fuels (04) category.

Information provided in the notes pertaining to HICP classifications can be found from the source at: http://ec.europa.eu/eurostat/cache/metadata/en/prc_hicp_esms.htm.
